title: Epsy - for seizures & epilepsy
description:
* WINNER of the Google Material Design Awards 2020 *

Seizure tracking has never been easier. Think of Epsy as your daily companion to help you track the things that matter. This includes staying on top of your medication routine, as well as logging other factors that can affect your condition.

Over time, Epsy gives you a much clearer view of your epilepsy and what triggers it, making it easier to spot patterns and trends. This helps you understand your condition, leading to better conversations with your doctor to develop more informed treatment decisions and living better with epilepsy.

Features included in the app:

TRACK SEIZURES, SIDE EFFECTS, AURAS AND MORE

Every time you have a seizure or other relevant experience, just open up Epsy and log the event to see it on your timeline. Doing this regularly helps you track your personal experience with epilepsy.

FOLLOW MEDICATIONS AND GET REMINDERS

Get a medication reminder when your next dose is due. Use the app to set-up your medication plan, get useful nudges to help you remember and keep track of your medications as well as how they make you feel.

Use Epsy to manage your medications and track your seizures. Get to know your triggers, learn more about how your mood, sleep, diet, and other factors, can affect your condition. Show up for every appointment with all the useful information you need right inside the app.

GET INSIGHTS AND FEEL MORE IN CONTROL

See how your condition changes over time.The more you use Epsy, the more it can help you. It’s a great way to get the clarity you need to feel more in control. Log meds, moods and more each day and after a week you’ll see useful stats start to pop up in the Insights view. See smart charts and medicine compliance trends, find-out how your lifestyle impacts your health. Get personalized insights and see trends on your seizures and side effects progress. 

GET PERSONALIZED REPORTS FOR YOUR DOCTORS

Got a doctor appointment coming up? With Epsy, you can create a personalized report on how you’ve been doing. So you can show it to your doctor and make decisions together based on the latest and most accurate data. Share your data with your doctors and empower them with detailed reports they can rely on to help them understand the evolution of your condition.

LEARN MORE ABOUT SEIZURES AND EPILEPSY

Get help separating fact from fiction with a choice of useful, interesting articles in the Content view. These cover a range of topics from lifestyle and wellness, to alternative treatment options and more. For reliable information and advice on managing epilepsy wherever you go, access our growing library of content making it easier for you to live with seizures.

WORKS WITH GOOGLE FIT APP

Epsy and the Google Fit app work seamlessly together, enabling easier health tracking with your health and wellness information all in one place.

Live better with Epilepsy, with Epsy.

Works with all phones running Android 7.0 and above.

summary: Take control of your epilepsy with Epsy. Log your medications, auras & seizures
